title: The Big Sex Scam
overview: Series which dips its toes into the deep, murky waters of the dating pool to discover bigamists, on-line scam artists, catfish and serial swindlers, who targeted innocent singletons and left them with broken hearts and empty bank balances.True stories of deception and double lives are relived by victims in painstaking detail, sharing the misery of how they were targeted and coerced into losing considerably more than their dignity.
